rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light and open layout in the front part of the townhouse.
Modern kitchen with efficient layout and adjoining pantry, designed to adhere to Vastu by placing it in the southeast corner.
Adjacent dining area designed for family gatherings; located near the living room.
Spacious master bedroom with an adjoining ensuite bathroom; located on the west side to ensure calm energy.
Additional bedroom for children or guests; integrated with shared bathroom facilities in the servant's quarters.
Master ensuite bathroom designed for privacy and comfort; includes modern fixtures with adherence to building norms.
Balcony attached to the living room for fresh air and scenic views; designed in accordance with Vastu's recommendations for ventilation.

openings.description: Reinforced steel door with glass inserts, providing security and a modern look in line with Brutalist aesthetics.
Large window panel designed to let in abundant natural light, enhancing the spatial experience in compliance with Vastu principles.
Window positioned for optimal sunlight and ventilation, complementing the kitchen layout as per local norms.
Sturdy staircase leading to the upper level, designed with minimalistic Brutalist features while ensuring safety standards.
